snippet: The founder of the Christian university where a gunman killed seven people this week says the suspect, a former nursing student, came to campus that day to discuss a tuition dispute.
abstract: Oikos University founder Jongjin Kim says that One Goh, former student who killed seven people at the university, came to campus on day of the shootings to discuss a tuition dispute.
lead_paragraph: The founder of the Christian university where a gunman killed seven people this week says the suspect, a former nursing student, came to campus that day to discuss a tuition dispute.
